top_comments.comment: Waiting for steam deck. I have a good feeling that one will finally fill the hole in my life.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I saw on another video that you can play SOME ps2 games on the device. I haven't seen which or how many but Kingdom Hearts is supposed to run on it.
It looks like a modded GPD XD

It's not bad but as you mention the hardware is a bit performance limited and controls are a tad lacking.

it's not the worst price point for what you get but in the same vein neither is a budget phone and a razr kishi. good news is you can upgrade the phone later on without having to re-buy the controller. and you have some if not less drawbacks.

Think I'm gonna pass... If I want top end of this tier emulation I just use my OnePlus 6t and a gamesir controller... Works great and it cost about three same all together... I'll wait and see what ambernic does but I won't hold my breath
